  • Constructor Details

    • GameboardController

      public GameboardController(Gameboard gameboard)
      Constructs a GameboardController with a specified Gameboard.
      Parameters:
      gameboard - : Gameboard instance to be controlled by this controller

  • Method Details

    • getGameboard

      public Gameboard getGameboard()
      Returns the (current) gameboard.
      Returns:
      a Gameboard instance

    • shiftRow

      public void shiftRow(int index, int direction)
      Shifts the tiles in a specified row of the gameboard in the given direction. If the direction is left, the row will be shifted to the left. If the direction is right, the row will be shifted to the right. Only valid indices and directions are accepted.
      Parameters:
      index - : index of the row to be shifted. Must be between 0 and 6 inclusive
      direction - : direction to shift the row. Use 1 for left and 3 for right
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the index is out of bounds or if the direction is invalid

    • shiftColumn

      public void shiftColumn(int index, int direction)
      Shifts a column on the gameboard at a specified index in the given direction. The column can be shifted upwards or downwards. Only valid indices and directions are accepted.
      Parameters:
      index - : index of the column to be shifted. Must be between 0 and 6 inclusive
      direction - : direction to shift the column. 0 for up and 2 for down
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the index is out of bounds or if the direction is invalid

    • rotateTile

      public void rotateTile(Tile tile, int orientation)
      Rotates the specified tile to a given orientation.
      Parameters:
      tile - : tile to be rotated. Must not be null
      orientation - : the desired orientation of the tile. Must be an integer between 0 and 3 inclusive, where each number represents a specific orientation state.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the provided tile is null or if the orientation is outside the valid range
